name: Ext_R3_ExpansionProfile_experimental
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExpansionProfile.experimental for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ExpansionProfile.experimental from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExpansionProfile|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: For testing purposes, not real usage
element.definition: A boolean value to indicate that this expansion profile is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.
element.comment: `ExpansionProfile.experimental` has no related element in R4:Parameters
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element ExpansionProfile.experimental is flagged IsModifier
